name: Petra Bot
description:
Petra is the default 0 A.D. AI bot. Please report issues to Wildfire Games (see the link in the main menu).

The AI difficulty level also determines how quickly units are trained, structures are built, and technologies are researched: Very Hard needs only 50% of the normaltime, Hard 71%, Medium 100%, Easy 141%, and Very Easy 200%. Also, the Sandbox level does not expand nor attack.
